title: Standardize Logging Architecture Across MomoAI Codebase

problem_statement.challenge: Inconsistent logging approaches across MomoAI modules prevent effective debugging, monitoring, and agent workflow analysis
core_issues: Fragmented logging implementations using different approaches (momo-logger, standard logging, print statements)
Missing agent context and trace correlation in multi-agent workflows
No standardized approach for AI-optimized logging levels and structured metadata
Inconsistent error handling and user-facing message patterns
problem_statement.impact: Reduced observability, difficult debugging, missed optimization opportunities

momo_logger_capabilities: Rich structured metadata with agent context

decision.decision: Standardize all MomoAI modules to use momo-logger with consistent agent-aware patterns
rationale: Provide consistent debugging and monitoring capabilities
Support AI-optimized logging for better agent interaction analysis
